form.name: complementary_feeding_for_children_9_to_less_than_12_months_of_age_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Complementary Feeding For Children 9 – < 12 MONTHS OF AGE TWO

field.name: When giving complementary foods, consider the following:
Frequency: feed your child 4 times a day
Amount: increase amount to ½ cup, show amount in 250 mL cup or other cups mother/caregiver brings. Use a separate plate to make sure child eat all the food given
Thickness: give finely chopped family foods, finger foods, and sliced fruits
Be patient and actively encourage your child to eat
Do not force your child to eat
Use a separate plate to feed child to make sure he or she eat all the food
